title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Speaking of the Orwell book "1984" - I too was wondering if it was going to be about a Dystopian society. Kinda like the horrors of what goes on in Handmaid's Tale. Big Brother is watching yada, yada.  👍

The symbolism of the teeth rain in Roanoke flew over the heads of 99.9% of the audience. There was pig/wild boar imagery throughout the season, and teeth are the only part of a body that pigs cannot digest. The significance of the teeth is to show how many victims the Butcher and Scathach have claimed in their worship of their dark gods. In episode 4(I think it was 4) the Butcher says she sent the teeth storm as a warning to them to leave the land before the blood moon or be added to the collection.

We haven’t had Bigfoot! The most American “monster” out there & he would fit in with a camp in the woods setting. Or Creature From The Black Lagoon Who we saw in a false teaser for Roanoke, I’d love to see him POP right out of the “Crystal Lake” too.

I think they’re going to have all the younger stars plus a bunch of new faces. All the under 30’s will play teenagers and this is RPM’s version of Camp Crystal Lake... hopefully we revisit hillbilly land & our old friends the Polks will be the slashers in this story. I want Snows & bastard Motts in this story too!
description:
Welcome to American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream! Host is MaryGirl Moody with special guest Melinda.
